detaileddescription.para: Alternative Carrier inactive.
Alternative Carrier active.
Alternative Carrier activating.
Alternative Carrier power status unknown.

briefdescription.para: Carrier Power State.

detaileddescription.para: Possible Carrier Power State field values in an Alternative Carrier record.

briefdescription.para: Constructor for an NFC Connection Handover generic record payload.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Connection Handover record description.
Pointer to the payload destination. If NULL, function will calculate the expected size of the Handover Connection record payload.
Size of the available memory to write as input. Size of the generated record payload as output.
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Function for clearing local records in the NFC NDEF Connection Handover records.

detaileddescription.para: This function clears local records of the Connection Handover records.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Connection Handover record descriptor.
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Function for adding a local record to an NFC NDEF Handover Select record.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to a Connection Handover record.
Pointer to a local record to add.
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Constructor for an NFC Connection Handover Carrier Record payload.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Connection Handover Carrier record description.
Pointer to the payload destination. If NULL, function will calculate the expected size of the Handover Connection Carrier Record payload.
Size of the available memory to write as input. Size of the generated record payload as output.
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Constructor for an NFC NDEF Alternative Carrier record payload.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Alternative Carrier record description.
Pointer to the payload destination. If NULL, function will calculate the expected size of the Alternative Carrier record payload.
Size of the available memory to write as input. Size of the generated record payload as output.
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Function for clearing an Auxiliary Data Reference in an NFC NDEF Alternative Carrier record.

detaileddescription.para: This function clears the Auxiliary Data References from the Alternative Carrier record.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Alternative Carrier record descriptor.

briefdescription.para: Function for adding an Auxiliary Data Reference to an NFC NDEF Alternative Carrier record.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to an ac record.
Pointer to the Auxiliary Data Reference data buffer.
Length of the Auxiliary Data Reference data.
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Constructor for an NFC NDEF Collision Resolution record payload.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the Collision Resolution record description.
Pointer to the payload destination. If NULL, function will calculate the expected size of the Collision Resolution record payload.
Size of the available memory to write as input. Size of the generated record payload as output.
If the operation was successful. Otherwise, a (negative) error code is returned.

briefdescription.para: Size of the type field of the Connection Handover records. Record types are defined in the file ch_rec.c.

detaileddescription.para: Mask of Carrier Power State bits in a first ac record byte.

memberdef.name: NFC_NDEF_CH_RECORD_DESC_DEF
memberdef.initializer: NFC_NDEF_MSG_DEF(_name, _max_records); \ struct nfc_ndef_ch_rec _name##_nfc_ch_rec = { \ .major_version = _major_version, \ .minor_version = _minor_version, \ .local_records = &NFC_NDEF_MSG(_name) \ }; \ NFC_NDEF_GENERIC_RECORD_DESC_DEF(_name, \ TNF_WELL_KNOWN, \ 0, \ 0, \ _rec_type_field, \ NFC_NDEF_CH_REC_TYPE_LENGTH, \ nfc_ndef_ch_rec_payload_encode, \ &(_name##_nfc_ch_rec))

briefdescription.para: Macro for creating and initializing an NFC NDEF record descriptor for the Connection Handover.

detaileddescription.para: This macro creates and initializes an instance of type nfc_ndef_record_desc and an instance of type nfc_ndef_ch_rec, which together constitute an instance of a Connection Handover record.
Use the macro NFC_NDEF_CH_RECORD_DESC to access the NDEF Connection Handover record descriptor instance.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the created record descriptor instance.
The NFC Forum Well Known Type Connection Handover record type.
Major version number of the supported Connection Handover specification.
Minor version number of the supported Connection Handover specification.
Maximum number of local records.

briefdescription.para: Macro for creating and initializing an NFC NDEF record descriptor for a Handover Select record.

detaileddescription.para: This macro creates and initializes an instance of type nfc_ndef_record_desc and an instance of type nfc_ndef_ch_rec, which together constitute an instance of a Handover Select record.
Use the macro NFC_NDEF_CH_RECORD_DESC to access the NDEF Handover Select record descriptor instance.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the created record descriptor instance.
Major version number of the supported Connection Handover specification.
Minor version number of the supported Connection Handover specification.
Maximum number of local records struct (ac records plus optional err record).

briefdescription.para: Macro for creating and initializing an NFC NDEF record descriptor for a Handover Request record.

detaileddescription.para: This macro creates and initializes an instance of type nfc_ndef_record_desc and an instance of type nfc_ndef_ch_rec, which together constitute an instance of a Handover Request record.
Use the macro NFC_NDEF_CH_RECORD_DESC to access the NDEF Handover Request record descriptor instance.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the created record descriptor instance.
Major version number of the supported Connection Handover specification.
Minor version number of the supported Connection Handover specification.
Maximum number of local records (cr record plus ac records).

briefdescription.para: Macro for creating and initializing an NFC NDEF record descriptor for a Handover Mediation record.

detaileddescription.para: This macro creates and initializes an instance of type nfc_ndef_record_desc and an instance of type nfc_ndef_ch_rec, which together constitute an instance of a Handover Mediation record.
Use the macro NFC_NDEF_CH_RECORD_DESC to access the NDEF Handover Mediation record descriptor instance.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the created record descriptor instance.
Major version number of the supported Connection Handover specification.
Minor version number of the supported Connection Handover specification.
Maximum number of local records (ac records).

briefdescription.para: Macro for creating and initializing an NFC NDEF record descriptor for a Handover Initiate record.

detaileddescription.para: This macro creates and initializes an instance of type nfc_ndef_record_desc.
Use the macro NFC_NDEF_CH_RECORD_DESC to access the NDEF Handover Initiate record descriptor instance.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the created record descriptor instance.
Major version number of the supported Connection Handover specification.
Minor version number of the supported Connection Handover specification.
Maximum number of local records (ac records).

briefdescription.para: Macro for accessing the NFC NDEF Handover Select record descriptor instance that was created with NFC_NDEF_CH_HS_RECORD_DESC_DEF.
Macro for creating and initializing an NFC NDEF record descriptor for the Handover Carrier record.

detaileddescription.para: This macro creates and initializes an instance of type nfc_ndef_record_desc and an instance of type nfc_ndef_ch_rec, which together constitute an instance of a Connection Handover record.
Use the macro NFC_NDEF_CH_HC_RECORD_DESC to access the NDEF Connection Handover record descriptor instance.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the created record descriptor instance.
ID of the payload.
Length of the payload.
Description of the payload.

briefdescription.para: Macro for accessing the NFC NDEF Handover Carrier record descriptor instance that was created with NFC_NDEF_CH_HC_GENERIC_RECORD_DESC_DEF.

memberdef.name: NFC_NDEF_CH_AC_RECORD_DESC_DEF
memberdef.initializer: struct nfc_ndef_ch_ac_rec_ref \ _name##nfc_ndef_ch_ac_rec_ref[_max_aux_data_ref_cnt]; \ struct nfc_ndef_ch_ac_rec \ _name##_nfc_ac_rec = { \ .cps = _cps, \ .carrier_data_ref = { _carr_data_ref_len, _carr_data_ref }, \ .max_aux_data_ref_cnt = _max_aux_data_ref_cnt, \ .aux_data_ref_cnt = 0, \ .aux_data_ref = _name##nfc_ndef_ch_ac_rec_ref \ }; \ NFC_NDEF_GENERIC_RECORD_DESC_DEF(_name, \ TNF_WELL_KNOWN, \ 0, \ 0, \ nfc_ndef_ch_ac_rec_type_field, \ NFC_NDEF_CH_REC_TYPE_LENGTH, \ nfc_ndef_ch_ac_rec_payload_encode, \ &(_name##_nfc_ac_rec))

briefdescription.para: Macro for creating and initializing an NFC NDEF record descriptor for an Alternative Carrier record.

detaileddescription.para: This macro creates and initializes an instance of type nfc_ndef_record_desc and an instance of type nfc_ndef_ch_ac_rec, which together constitute an instance of an Alternative Carrier record.
Use the macro NFC_NDEF_CH_AC_RECORD_DESC to access the NDEF Alternative Carrier record descriptor instance.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the created record descriptor instance.
Carrier Power State value.
Length of the Carrier Data Reference field.
Pointer to the Carrier Data Reference field.
Maximum number of Auxiliary Data Reference fields.

briefdescription.para: Macro for accessing the NFC NDEF Alternative Carrier record descriptor instance that was created with NFC_NDEF_AC_RECORD_DESC_DEF.

memberdef.name: NFC_NDEF_CH_CR_RECORD_DESC_DEF
memberdef.initializer: struct nfc_ndef_ch_cr_rec \ _name##_nfc_cr_rec = { \ .random = _random_number, \ }; \ NFC_NDEF_GENERIC_RECORD_DESC_DEF(_name, \ TNF_WELL_KNOWN, \ 0, \ 0, \ nfc_ndef_ch_cr_rec_type_field, \ NFC_NDEF_CH_REC_TYPE_LENGTH, \ nfc_ndef_ch_cr_rec_payload_encode, \ &(_name##_nfc_cr_rec))

briefdescription.para: Macro for creating and initializing an NFC NDEF record descriptor for an Collision Resolution record.

detaileddescription.para: This macro creates and initializes an instance of type nfc_ndef_record_desc and an instance of type nfc_ndef_ch_cr_rec, which together constitute an instance of an Collision Resolution record.
Use the macro NFC_NDEF_CR_RECORD_DESC to access the NDEF Collision Resolution record descriptor instance.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the created record descriptor instance.
Generated random number required to resolve a collision.

briefdescription.para: Macro for accessing the NFC NDEF Alternative Carrier record descriptor instance that was created with NFC_NDEF_CH_CR_RECORD_DESC_DEF.
Generation of NFC NDEF Connection Handover records for NDEF messages.
